name: Pirates Shotguns & Crabs
description:
You are a stranded Pirrrate fighting pesky Crabs to defend whats left... Coconuts !

Use WASD to move, Space to Shoot or fight.

Collect Gold from Killed Crabs to spend on the Merchant when he comes around.

Retrive Stolen Coconuts with E and bring them back to your Cocount Storage.

If you have a special Item use it and place it with Q.

Good Luck & Have Fun !
